about_the_game:
THOKO is a thrilling single-player first-person shooter platformer that combines fast-paced action with innovative movement mechanics. Dive into a world where precision, speed, and agility are your greatest allies. Master advanced techniques such as strafing, BHOP (bunny hopping), and surfing to navigate challenging environments and outmaneuver your enemies.

Featuring stunning animations and cutting-edge visual effects, THOKO delivers an immersive gaming experience like no other. Get ready to test your skills and push your limits in this adrenaline-pumping adventure.

🔫 Key Features:

First-person shooter platformer gameplay
Advanced movement mechanics: strafing, BHOP, and surfing
High-quality animations and visual effects
Challenging and dynamic environments
Stay tuned for more updates, and don't forget to like, comment, and subscribe to our channel for the latest news on THOKO!

Join the THOKO community:

Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/fGr2CfQF

Please note that THOKO is still in development. I invite you to enjoy the game, test it out, and help me improve by providing your suggestions and references for future levels in the comments. Your feedback is invaluable to me!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit, Version 2004 / Build 19041 or higher) OS Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 / AMD Athlon 200GE
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / Radeon R5 200
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
